location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Pringle Riach, Acting Resident, Bushire to Henry Willock, Tehran

mods.abstract: Riach informs Willock that his letter of 6 December 1825, with accompanying packet, had been forwarded to Bombay; that Major George Willock would be supplied with subsidy money; and that the slave boy belonging to Arrathoon Malchoon had been given up to Riach, probably as a result of Willock's letter to Zekee Khan [Zakī Khān], the Prime Minister of Fars.
